In both reality and virtual space: cool people make cool stuff, people like hanging out there, awful people see a crowd they can annoy, capitalists see a crowd whose money they can extract, the cool stuff is bought up, the cool people evicted- and the cycle goes on
Scene death, a massive vibe shift, zeitgeist in transition, core psychic changes at hand

At #ogp where everything is chill. Cops are off pursuing march I guess. And did you see the TANK?

March now heading east on 14th. #OccupyOakland
RT @susie_c: At least one targeted snatch and grab arrest on known UC Berkeley organizer confirmed. #OO #Baym1gs
Another namebadge obscured because of the shotgun the officer is wielding. If anyone should be accountable it's them. http://t.co/9lJ6HwFb
I always try to get the names of officers w/ the shotguns. All of them I went up to covered their namebadges like so. http://t.co/X3k2vTYg
RT @hyphy_republic: March to shut down banks was headed back to plaza, clearly stated it was heading back to join rally, rushed, brutali ...
That is to say, if the cops decided not to provoke the crowd by making an un-needed targeted arrest, things would be much more peacful.
In my objective opinion, cops made targeted arrest, were surrounded by angry crowd, needed to teargas/shove way out. While van was smashed.
Also, cops definitely gassed themselves at 14th and broadway. That or they became very quickly persuaded, as tears rolled down their faces.
And this is the beautiful Occupy Oakland marching down Harrison St. (?) at around 11:00AM http://t.co/rKxpbXhj
This officer seemed to be in charge, but apparently not in charge of keeping police vans from getting smashed. http://t.co/ezYViChV
Home for a sec. Downloading photos. This is a picture of the woman who was targeted by snatch squad, after her arrest. http://t.co/qxykdmvr

#OccupyOakland Saw new snatch team tactics first hand. Crowd of OPD walked through crowd looking 4 ppl.
Idk why I felt I could just "go  check out #ogp for a minute". Going home for water and rest of my gear.
#OccupyOakland First time I've ever heard cops tell us to go INTO #ogp.
#OccupyOakland Small dance party sesh at 18th and broadway. Some dance in street as others call to leave for banks.
CAN'T GET TO DANCE PARTY IN THE ST AT 14TH & BROADWAY FAST ENOUGH I MISSED YOUUUUU
I didn't think I was being attacked because I have a camera and there was a personal vendetta against me... part of being in the action.
Dear #OccupyOakland I've ACTUALLY GOTTEN HIT WITH A BOTTLE (Oct25th) and I didn't freak out- I recognized it was a mistake & moved on...
Alright party people, I think I'm gonna head out to OGP and see what's up. Chilling during the day, focusing on being out in the evening.

If our president just sat down and methodically went through putting the problems the US faces on a whiteboard we'd gain golden perspective.
If the US presidential elections were held tomorrow, honestly, the only person I'd feel comfortable voting for would be @poezn - Porath 2012
Honestly, I have no idea who I'm going to vote for in 2012. I feel like Obama has failed to do a lot. Not so sure about Ron Paul...
Thumbsucker was such a GREAT movie. Made me laugh, there were some really great shots, and it made me think philosophically about life. 9/10
BEARD. GET ON MY FACE.
Uneventful open house: no one came. Went to salvation army on the way home. Bought some a belt (!!) some pants, and a Denny's shirt.
New photoblog post: Quiet Circleville http://tr.im/kbnd
And now, much to my chagrin, I will sleep.
Ohhh. My best friend Daisy. I love her.
Went to Petco with Peter. Got a collar, leash, food bowl, and chewtoy for the dog I'm (hopefully) getting on Sunday. I am very excited.
Previous tweet was about GTA; so is this one. Why doesn't Niko just ROLL DOWN the window?! YOU JUST KNOCKED THE WINDOW OUT OF MY CORVETTE!
Woke up early to take my car to to get washed and painted for my hot date at 12:00. WHO KNEW IT WOULD TAKE 3 HOURS?! MISSED MY DATE. PISSED.
Niko's looking pretty fly. http://flickr.com/photos/pseudoplacebo/2456351822/
Dear Twitter, could I please have a Twistory invite. Love, EJ.
Super creepy; a principal compiles a list of all the student's relationships. If that was my school, I'd be pissed.( http://is.gd/aKf )

commits.message: Update keyboard name in Rhymestone Kconfig.defconfig from "Rhymestone" to "Rhyme" for consistency and clarity.
Add type declarations for SSD1306_REVERSE_MODE and LV_Z_DPI in Rhymestone Kconfig.defconfig to enhance configuration clarity.
Fix indentation in Rhymestone Kconfig.defconfig to ensure consistent formatting of LV_COLOR_DEPTH choice.
Refactor Rhymestone Kconfig.defconfig by removing unnecessary type declarations for SSD1306_REVERSE_MODE and LV_Z_DPI to streamline configuration settings.
Add VSCode settings for status bar customization and update Rhymestone configuration for split keyboard support, USB, deep sleep, and Bluetooth transmit power
